A sermon preached on the fast-day, November 13, 1678, at St. Margarets Westminster, before the Honourable House of Commons by Edward Stillingfleet ... Stillingfleet, Edward, 1635-1699.
[4], 52 p.
Printed by Margaret White for Henry Mortlock ..., London : 1678.
Running title: A fast-sermon preached Nov. 13, before the House of Commons. Reproduction of original in Duke University Library.
